cast.name: 艾莉克希娅·拉斯姆森 Alexia Rasmussen

awards:
第49届鹿特丹国际电影节(2020)
　　未来之光奖(提名) 吉利安·华莱士·霍尔瓦特

director.name: 吉利安·华莱士·霍尔瓦特 Gillian Wallace Horvat

introduction: Playing a perhaps semi-fictionalized version of herself, director Gillian Horvat resolutely navigates an inspiring series of comical obstacles, skeptical intimates, and biased industry gatekeepers to get her first feature film off the ground. From moxia.cc a subjectively innocent initial concept that sings to fans of the 'My Favorite Murder' podcast-Gillian deftly executes the first in a series of impeccable transgressions with an unyielding allegiance to the Muse that resides within the heart of an unforgivable madness...a quality revered in cinema's greatest auteurs. Co-opting the rules of a historically exclusive game, I BLAME SOCIETY is both an amusing and alternately disturbing meta-narrative exploring the dark side of artistic vision-articulating the oft-celebrated egregious qualities deemed to be intrinsic to cinematic brilliance.
